title: PatientHealthRecord
description: This is an example record type schema of data that would be stored in an EHR/EMR. All record types in PrivCloud follow the JSON Schema specification (https://json-schema.org). More examples can be found on the PrivCloud GitHub site and here @ https://json-schema.org/learn/miscellaneous-examples.html

socialSecurityNumber.description: The social security number of the patient.

patientIDD.description: The identification number of the patient.

firstName.description: The first name of the patient.

lastName.description: The last name of the patient.

phoneNumber.description: The primary contact number for the patient.
phoneNumber.comment: Don't use this regex for phone numbers.

zip.description: The zip code of the address.

employmentStatus.description: The employment status of the patient.

race.pattern: ^(American Indian or Alaska Native|Asian|Black or African American|Hispanic or Latino|White|Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander)$

age.description: The age of the the patient.

medications.description: The list of medications the patient is taking

vitals.description: The historical vitals for the patient

startDate.description: The start date for the medication

refills.description: The number of refills for the medication

vital.description: A vitals record for the patient

bpSystolic.description: The systolic measure of the blood pressure for the patient.

bpDiastolic.description: The diastolic measure of the blood pressure for the patient.

heartRate.description: The number of beats per minute for the patients heart rate.

respiratory.description: The number of breaths per minute for the patient.
